metadata.title: CVE-2022-1311 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in shell in Google Chrome on ChromeOS prior to 100.0.4896.88allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
